title: AIIMS Rajkot Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 03 Technical Officer and Other Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Rajkot (AIIMS Rajkot) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Senior Program Coordinators, Technical Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Ph.D, Post Graduation, and MBA can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Rajkot Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and e...
